titleStmt.title: Books of Kings; Chronological list of the kings of Israel and Juda and of the prophets; Ethiopic explanation of several Hebrew names; Books of Chronicles, Prayer of Manasses, Kǝbra Nagaśt

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / beta maṣāḥǝft

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msItem.note: The text agrees generally with that of BNFet2 and of Dillmann's edition.

msItem.title: Chronological list of the kings of Israel and Juda and of the prophets
Ethiopic explanation of several Hebrew names
msItem.incipit: ኤሎሄ፡ ብሂል፡ አምላከ። ኣዶናይ፡ ብሂል፡ እግዚእ። ፀባኦት፡ ብሂል፡ ዘኀይላት።

msItem.note: There are rubrics in the upper and lower margins

supportDesc.condition: Between and as well as between and a leaf is missing.

handNote.note: The dating to the 13th century is impossible to maintain, see 365b.
እግዚኣብሔር፡ is always written like this.

item.desc: Note mentioning the names of some of the manuscript's owners, Walda Giyorgis Wasan Sagad and his father Tewodros
item.q: ነገሥተ፡ ክብረ፡ ነገሥት፡ ኅፁፃን፡ the paralipomena ናቸው፡ ዝመጽሐፍ፡ ዘወልደ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ ወሰን፡ ሰገድ፡ ውአቡሁ፡ ቴዎድሮስ።

item.desc: The rubrics have been added on the top of the pages and the lower margins.

origin.note: The dating to the 13th century is impossible to maintain, see 365b.

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.

revisionDesc.change: foreign added and rubric changed to note

ab.l: ወኢሎፍሊኒ፡ በእልክቱ፡ በዓል፡ ገብሩ፡ ቀትለ፡ ምስለ፡ እስራኤል፡ ወእስራኤልኒ፡ ጐዩ፡ እምገጾሙ ለኢሎፍሊ፡ ወወደቁ፡ ቅቱላን፡ እስራኤል፡ በደብረ፡ ግሉቡይ፡
ወሰደድዎሙ፡ ኢሎፍሊ፡ ለሳኦል፡ ወለደቂቁ፡ ወቀተልዎ፡ ኢሎፍሊ፡ ለኢዮታን፡ ወልዱ፡ ለሳኦል፡ ወለአሚናዳብ፡ ወለመልካሱዕ፡ ደቂቀ፡ ሳኦል፡
ወከብደ፡ ጥቀ፡ ቀትል፡ ዲበ፡ ሳኦል፡ ወረከብዎ፡ ነዳፍያን፡ በነዲፍ፡ ወበጻማ፡ ወሐመ፡ ጥቀ፡ እምኀበ፡ አቅስስቲሆሙ።

ወአውሥአ፡ ሳኦል፡ ወይቤሎ፡ ለዘ፡ አልዐለ፡ ንዋየ፡ ሐቅሉ፡ እምላሕ፡ እንከ፡ ሰ፡ ሰይፈ፡ ወርግዘኒ፡ ቦቱ። ወኢይምጽኡ፡ እሉ፡ እለ፡ ኢኮኑ፡ ግዙራን፡ ወኢይሳለቁ፡ ለዕሌየ፡ ወኢፈቀደ፡ ውእቱ፡ ብእሲ፡ ዘአንሥአ፡ ንዋየ፡ ሐቅል፡ ከመ፡ ይቅትሎ፡ እስመ፡ ብዙኀ፡ ይገርም፡ ቀቲሎቱ፡ ወመልሐ፡ ሳኦል፡ ሰይፎ፡ ወአቀመ፡ ወወደቀ፡ ለዕሌሁ፡
ወርእየ፡ ዝኩ፡ ብእሲ፡ ዘአንሥአ፡ ንዋየ፡ ሐቅሉ፡ ከመ፡ ሞተ፡ ሳኦል፡ ወወእቱኒ፡ ወደቀ፡ ውስተ፡ ሰይፉ፡ ወሞተ።
